tool.name: Upload FASTQ files
tool.description: from CRUKCI recent sequencing data currently on staging server

param.name: library
param.label: The SLX id of the library to fetch.

tool.help: To use this tool enter the SLX id of the library to fetch. It needs to be of this format 'SLX-12203' starting with three uppercase letters 'SLX', followed by a dash '-' sign and endding with the number which identifies your library.
